title: Warikitta Kankei desukara.
original_name: 割り切った関係ですから。
sinopse: Kaburagi Aya, a highschool student who doesn't feel fit in with her highschool life, and Kurosaki Sei, a teacher who was oppressed by the trauma from the past, knowing each other by matching App. With ulterior motives from both side, the relationship between them has been distorted gradually...
